column3: “The Green Lantern surely sticks to its name,  saving your lame ass and making you a goddamn hero. This really brought the most positive and creative side of me that lasts for hours. The effects come upon you pretty lightly and took about 25 mins to kick in. Effects may vary. I did a lot of introspective soul searching which is why I have such a positive attitude with and without this strain, but it was definitely bec...”

“It has a bold piney/citrus/sweet scent and flavor(pretty epic) whilst delivering a massive blow to the head and body;  Very good sativa.  It also has an inkling of a butteriness to it when smoked.  The fragrance outperforms the flavor, but not the high...not by a longshot...  Notable for the hazy long-lasting full-body buzz, being incredibly smooth, great taste and smell, an instant classic!!!  Uplifts the mood and b...”
“very easy on the body yet the perfect amount of medication which is great in the morning to get ready for the day best strain for being active so far”

“This strain is perfect for anyone! This strain gives a long lasting high great for anyone. Everything about this strain is incredible:

Effects-happy, uplifted, energetic(in the beginning of the high, tired/couch locked(in the middle of the high), and hungry as fuck

Smell-piney citrus, almost like soap or lemon pledge

Taste-piney and citrus and diesel after taste

Looks-dark green with dark red pistils

Good for-an...”

“Lmao crazy name cause this strain left me spacey. Green Lantern is a straight head high thanks to Jack Herer and it's definitely a top 15 strain for me. 

If you need something for socializing I would definitely recommend Green Lantern. Big nugs and very dense and dark green! 

Earthy, pungent taste with the hint of lemon. 

4.7 out of 5 Fuzzy Stars 

😎🤘😗🌿🔥💨”

“Mental clarity despite strong haze. Great for walking. Made me hungry but I had just had dinner so I didn't eat. Head pain feeling a bit better. Definitely a strong haze feeling, mentally. Things moved slower. Sounds more noticeable. Walking my dog felt nice, spending time with her. Calms the body down, slight shakiness. More comfortable. I would smoke this to get away from an uncomfortable thought. Great for ADHD. S...”
“This strain just made me a stoner to a hero real quick! Very happy trip and talkative. My favorite strain so far! - Captain PeeNoise”

“This is without a doubt the most potent weed I've ever smoked. It's very different then your average weed, it is a super cerebral high, almost no body high at all, and it does not provide the warm fuzzy feeling most weed does. It's a real treat and a blast, but is definitely situational, I would not use it for relaxing, but if you're down for some self exploration and wonder get ready because this strain will give yo...”

“This strain is wondrous. It's energetic, happy and uplifting while still providing a pain-free body numbing. I'm very mentally alert and I can think faster than my fingers can type right now. This is my fifth attempt at writing this review...I accidently keep erasing it. One great time.”

“I was very paranoid although I didn't feel anything . My body went numb , the high lasts longer than I thought 
 it would almost 8 hours”

“Made me feel so happy 😀 does not put you to sleep right away you get to enjoy your high had no aches or pains Life is just good with this green light shinning an all you really wanna do is everything lol enjoy I did”
“This strain literally made me feel like a superhero lol. My 4-5 homeboys and I (stoners) all got lifted, and would highly recommend.”
“Very happy and uplifting high, a little bit of a tangie feeling to it”
“Definitely one of the best sativas I've smoked. Not a fan of the earthy taste, but the high is unbelievable. The piny aroma was nice too”
“This strain has a really good head high as well as a decent body high I’d say this is a good sativa for around the afternoon or evening time.”
“Amazing strain lots of euphoria and happiness with this one feel as if it fades offf very fast butter way this strain makes you feel outweighs the fact it’s gonna fade off great strain 💪🏼”
“Green lantern is a very nice one!”

“This is one of the best Sativas ever. I smoked this with my girlfriend and then things got kind of hot and heavy in the backseat of her car. Let me tell you something, green lantern makes you the most calm laid back mother fucker around. I got caught literally with my pants down in the back seat of my car with my girlfriend by the police. This amazing strain kept me so laid back and calm I was cracking jokes with the...”
“I'm concentrating nicely and feel no pain whatsoever and feeling pretty robust from toking on this fantastic, amazing and aromatic flower!”
“I loved the great quick headrush it induces for panic attacks greatly and I'm able to eat because it allows me to be Hungary, but if I had the choice This skinny bitch will make u fat”
“Very uplifting strain and great for social occasions fighting against anxiety, depression and stress. A must cop”
“Great strain! Gives you a nice head buzz and long lasting body high. Keeps you alert, happy, and energetic. Great for numbing pain too!”
“Not for the novice smoker; very potent.”
“I love, love, love this strain. Definitely for an on-the-go" person like me. I love that it eases stress
column4: the body high is AMAZING and it makes me cocentrate!!!

column1: Definitely recommended for both chilling at home or when your out and about. But a heads up... this strain made me "want" to do stuff or be creative. So if you like the "couch lock" strains. This one ain't for you.

column3: “GL looks HD, smell & taste is sweet. I love it. I would recommend this to anyone.”
“Sabor terroso, olor a bosque. Coloca unos 10 minutos después del primer golpe. Te tranquiliza pero te da un tipo de energía más enfocado en pensar, platicar, leer.”
“Smooth smoke, great taste. Wake and bake strain. Amazing effects, awesome for stress anxiety and fatigue”
“Very body effective! Nice piney smell and sweet taste! Great strain!”
